reviews.title: My head is happy
reviews.review_text: Okay, so, my scalp was a hot mess. Itchy, flaky, the whole nine yards. I tried everything short of setting it on fire (don't worry, I didn't). Then I found this Scalp Care Clarifying Shampoo with Apple Cider Vinegar. And let me tell you, it's a miracle worker. My scalp is finally calm, the flakes are gone, and it actually feels… healthy? Like, a scalp spa day, but in my shower. Five stars. My head has never been happier.
My daughter has very ouly hair. until finding this product she had a difficult timecgetting her hair to look clean right after wash. now her hair looks so clean for 2-3 days

reviews.title: Great for removing build-up and leaving curl.
reviews.review_text: I like this very much. My scalp feels fresh and clean. I started coloring my hair. I found the build up of conditioner and shampoo was leaving my hair feeling greasy and weighed down. I was glad to find this product. I have a natural wave to my hair and find products ruin the curl and I don't like that. This leaves my hair fresh and my scalp feeling clean.
This is the only shampoo/conditioner that helped my scalp with itchiness and dandruff. And I have been trying so many things and this is the only thing that has helped me.

reviews.title: Itch relief
reviews.review_text: I have tried many shampoos and medications to try and eliminate the itching on my scalp unsuccessfully. Finally after two times of using this shampoo I have finally gotten some relief. The itching is totally gone yet, but I am hopeful.

reviews.title: Difference
reviews.review_text: I could tell a difference in my hair after one use. Then washed it the second time a few days later. My hair feels nice. I rotate shampoos but hadn't used a clarifying shampoo for many years.

reviews.title: Oily hair with this shampoo don't care!
reviews.review_text: Works well and doesn't dry out your scalp. Strips your hair without leaving it feeling like straw! My new go to shampoo, especially since I'm going through menopause and waking up with night sweats and my hair is extremely oily in the mornings!

reviews.title: Easy Peasy
reviews.review_text: This clarifying shampoo work and it’s gentle on my extremely sensitive scalp. It doesn’t not damage, but improves my waves. It’s not meant for every day use FYI. This is now a staple product for me no doubt.

reviews.title: Great product, very moisturizing
reviews.review_text: I love this brand and this product lives up to my expectations. Does a great job of getting rid of a flaky, itchy scalp and is very moisturizing. Leaves my hair feeling silky and flake free. The smell is very mild and somewhat minty, not overpowering. Would recommend!

Smells good really cleans the oils %26 other buildup from hair made mine dry will only use when hair needs build up of chemicals removed about every 6 weeks small bottle but only need small amount lathers up good rinses easy. Cheap priced.

reviews.title: Great for oily hair!
reviews.review_text: My daughter has struggled with her oily hair and now she can wash her hair every other day instead of every day.

reviews.title: no acv smell!
reviews.review_text: smells minty, clean and fresh! definitely cleans the scalp and clarified the hair. my hair was more tangled than usual after so i wouldnt use it more often than weekly. my curls also popped!
Lathers very well, works good for coily hair, reduced the amount of shedding I usually have by a ton, removed everything from my hair! Improved my silk press

This is my first time using this shampoo, and I must say, I like it. The smell, isn't bad, nor the best, but I can say it is very moisturizing to be a clarifying shampoo. I'd purchase it again for sure.

reviews.title: Like it
reviews.review_text: really like this shampoo, seems to have helped shedding a bit

reviews.title: Clarifies well
reviews.review_text: Does a great job of clarifying! I alternate with a non clarifying shampoo to keep from drying my hair out completely. Great summer smell!
clean minty scent does a great job of removing build up without overstripping and drying
I love the shampoo for my scalp but I hate the conditioner, so drying.

reviews.title: Obsessed with this product line!
reviews.review_text: Came here specifically to leave a review because these products are SO GOOD. I’ve been using the shampoo, conditioner, and scalp serum. I had been experiencing some flaking and dry scalp after using a mousse for a long time. After ONE WASH, my hair was totally back to normal - actually, better than normal. My hair looks and feels clean and soft. I really love what these did for me. For reference, I have 2b wavy hair. Cannot recommend these enough if your scalp needs some love.
cant beat the price . clarifys the hair very well .

reviews.title: Clean
reviews.review_text: And left my hair, clean without a coating on it. Cream rinse was good too of the same flavor.
it did its job with one was my hair and scalp felt and looked amazing

reviews.title: Excellent Clarifying Shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I LOVE this clarifying shampoo. As a curly girl, I feel like clarifying is a really important part of my routine and I do it once every two weeks or so. This shampoo did a really great job and smells so good.

reviews.title: Great smell
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great product works well with my frizzy wavy hair! Has a great smell. The bottle is pretty hard to squeeze the shampoo out but that's the only complaint. Love the great ingredients perfect for my hair texture

reviews.title: Buy It
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t leave my hair dry. Like I thought it would
I really like this product bthey charged me for 2 of them and I have to take 1 of them back

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Scalp Care Clarifying Shampoo with Apple Cider Vinegar has made a big difference in how I manage my curls. It cleans my scalp without drying out my hair, keeping my curls soft and hydrated. I've noticed way less breakage when brushing, and my curls look healthier and more vibrant.

reviews.title: Tames frizz
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] 4 stors because I can't get passed the scent the shampoo still foams well with the clean ingredients. I'd say it is effective at taming my thin, frizzy hair especially in the humidity. It is worth the money to purchase. Would recommend the conditioner and serum to use with the shampoo for best results.

reviews.title: recommended.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I loved the presentation and packaging. This shampoo promises to help you with the scalp and hair loss. It is made of aloe vera and coconut water, a completely vegan formula. The aroma is mint and leaves the scalp fresh after use. The shampoo has a normal texture like all these types of products, like viscose. The product has a good size.

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I did not care for the scent of this product but when looking at the ingredients it does not seem to very super harmful. It was not super effective in my experience

reviews.title: Love!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] One of my new favorite shampoos! I actually love this product and started to use it on an everyday basis. Fair price and good packaging! Works for me to help my hair not get oily as fast at the roots!

reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this shampoo. It lathered up well and I felt like it really cleaned my hair and scalp. It wasn't too drying either. The scent is subtle. I would definitelyrepurchase.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I know you don't need a lather to get your hair clean, but this product doesn't stretch very far. It smells great and definitely cleans my hair though. Would buy again.

reviews.title: Maui shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Smells amazing and feels clean. It's very affordable and cute packaging. It makes my hair feel so clean and shiny, very natural ingredients. And it leaves my hair smelling so good.

reviews.title: Good product but not for me
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Product worked for my hair, unfortunately it didn’t work with my skin. After a week I noticed results, but I also noticed an itchy broken out scalp. Would work well for others without sensitive skin
I’ve been using apple cider vinegar on my hair for years. This shampoo isn’t exactly like ACV, but it’s food. Feels rather luxurious.

reviews.title: Nice value
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love the smell and that this is made natural but still works well. Nice looking and sized bottles and not badly priced. Tea tree is very invigorating.

reviews.title: So so
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great smell and does leave a cooling sensation on your scalp. However left my hair very heavy and and I started to notice my fallout increased while using this product

reviews.title: Must have
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The fresh scent makes your scalp feels super clean . Gets rid of any build up in your hair while also moisturizing. Great for people who wear a lot of hair products on their hair .

reviews.title: Nice and clean
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The shampoo felt great and left my hair and scalp feeling cool and refreshed. The smell was great, it was nice and minty. The packing was easy to use and the ingredients were printed clearly.

reviews.title: Fantastic Shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Beautiful product. Really nice scent- Minty and fresh. Makes my scalp feel cool and clean. The packaging is beautiful and attractive. I love the product and will be purchasing as it’s a great value to my everyday self care routine.

reviews.title: Moisturizing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this stuff! A lot of shampoos leave my hair feeling dry but this one is very moisturizing. I also haven't noticed any dandruff which is common for me. I don't notice any shine like with some higher end products but I am pleased with this regardless especially for the price point.

reviews.title: It's good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was gifted this by Maui for review. I'm not a fan of apple cider vinegar, but it does have good benefits. I used this once a week for 3 weeks and my scalp feels better and my hair has more volume.

reviews.title: Amazing product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product for free from Influenster and brand(s) in exchange for my honest review. My first impression of this product was the crisp clean smell. It made my hair feel easy to style and gave great shine!!

reviews.title: Greta shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this shampoo. Gets my hair so clean without stripping it too much. Also I get nervous when products have apple cider vinegar but this one isn’t overpowering. Great at getting my hair so clean!

reviews.title: Great clarifying shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a great shampoo to use once a week. For me, my hair is a little dry so I don’t want to use a deep cleansing shampoo like this every time. But I love to use a clarifying shampoo especially when I have product building. This leaves my hair feeling clean and sleek.

reviews.title: Drying on its own
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My hair feels a little dry after using the shampoo, but it does feel clean. My only complaint is that I don’t have very thick hair when using certain shampoos but after using this one it somehow feels more thick and dry . When paired with the conditioner it’s okay though!

reviews.title: A Tangled Mess
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Although this shampoo did cleanse well, it is probably the worst shampoo I have used. My hair got so tangled and felt so dry. This has never happened to me before with any other shampoo, cheap or expensive. One star for cleansing.

reviews.title: It’s ok
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I do have to use a lot of this to get any type of cleaning g in my hair. It doesnt suds up like my other shampoos maybe because of the natural ingredients? I’ll definitely keep using it but not sure if I’ll buy in the future.

reviews.title: Good Drugstore Clarifying Shampoo!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This Maui Moisture Clarifying Shampoo works great on my wavy hair! I love using dry shampoo and I feel like this shampoo does a great job of getting rid of the buildup, without stripping my hair. It also smells amazing and you can’t beat the price!

reviews.title: Amazing clarifying shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I’ve been on the market for a shampoo for my wavy hair. I realized I have low porosity fine hair and this Maui moisture clarifying shampoo really helped my hair. I usually let my hair air dry and I noticed when I used this line my hair would look smooth and waves actually looked nice with minimal frizz. This also made my hair so clean and felt good on my scalp. I have tried a lot of shampoos and this was the one that actually did something for me. Highly recommend checking this brand out!

reviews.title: It definitely clarifies
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is my 1st time trying this brand and I am impressed. I generally only buy from the professional stores since I'm licensed to do so. This is because most drugstore shampoos and conditioners leave leftover residue on my hair, but so far, I'm not feeling that. Maybe because it's clarifying. It smells nice. The clarifying is doing its job because I live in Florida. Between the pool and beach, my hair goes through it. I'd buy this for sure.

reviews.title: Amazinggg!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Ladies! You know how your man never seems to notice your hair well this product got him noticing! He said it made my hair smell good and feel so soft. This smells so great and is great size for a clarifying shampoo. This helps with any buildup i have on my hair. It made me go buy more maui products!!! 10/10 recommend!!!

reviews.title: Lovely scent
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love the scent of this shampoo. It is a mixture of coconut and eucalyptus but heavier on the eucalyptus side. It leaves my hair feeling soft and moisturized and it keeps my hair from getting greasy longer than other shampoos I’ve tried.

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I don’t know if I’d fully call this a clarifying shampoo but I don’t think I care. It cleans so nicely. The scent is great, not too strong. Some mint products overdo it. I still hate the bottle but the shampoo is thin enough that it doesn’t matter.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I felt like this was good. It didn’t strip my hair or make it feel dry, but I don’t feel like it removed everything I wanted it to. I was worried that it was going to smell like vinegar, but I was surprised by the smell.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo is good. It has a nice minty scent. It makes my scalp feel very clean and refreshed. It leaves a nice tingling sensation. The packaging is ok. They could make it better because it is hard to squeeze out the product especially the last bit left in the bottle. I will buy this again because it is very refreshing.

reviews.title: Maui Moisture Clarifying Shampoo Review
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Maui Moisture Clarifying Shampoo is a refreshing and effective option for those looking to deep clean their hair and scalp, especially after build-up from styling products, hard water, or excess oil. Formulated with hibiscus water and passionfruit extract, this shampoo is designed to cleanse without stripping away the hair's natural moisture. Packaging and Texture: The shampoo comes in a brightly colored, sturdy plastic bottle with a flip-top cap for easy dispensing. The consistency is a bit on the thicker side, but it lathers up nicely and spreads easily through the hair, requiring only a small amount for a full cleanse. Performance: This clarifying shampoo does an excellent job of removing product buildup, residue, and impurities from the scalp and hair. Despite its clarifying abilities, it doesn’t leave hair feeling dry or overly stripped, which can sometimes be a concern with other deep-cleansing shampoos. The formula gently cleanses while maintaining the hair’s moisture balance, leaving it feeling refreshed and light. Scent: The fragrance is a tropical, fruity blend that’s refreshing without being overwhelming. It lingers subtly on the hair, leaving it smelling clean and fresh. Results: After using the Clarifying Shampoo, hair feels thoroughly cleansed but not stripped or brittle. It’s a great choice for those who regularly use styling products, oils, or dry shampoos, as it clears away residue without compromising the health of your hair. While it’s effective in clearing build-up, it also helps to maintain the softness and manageability of the hair, which makes it a great option for regular use—though, depending on your hair type, you may want to alternate with a gentler shampoo to prevent over-drying. Final Thoughts: The Maui Moisture Clarifying Shampoo is a solid choice for anyone looking for a gentle yet effective way to cleanse their hair. It provides a deep clean without the harshness typical of some clarifying shampoos, and its nourishing ingredients ensure your hair stays hydrated and smooth. Perfect for occasional use to remove buildup and refresh your hair, this shampoo delivers great results without sacrificing moisture or softness.

reviews.title: Gentle and effective cleaning
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Excellent shampoo for wavy and curly hair. It gently cleanses, leaving my hair and scalp feeling refreshed. The scent of apple cider isn't noticeable at all, and it produces a great lather. After using it, my hair feels soft and shines beautifully. It is gentle enough for daily use.

reviews.title: Just what I needed for my scalp!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like that Maui Moisture came out with a scalp care shampoo. I’m a fan of apple cider vinegar—I think it does work well on the scalp. I have a lot of itchy dandruff, and I think this shampoo does help. Since it’s supposed to be clarifying, I don’t recommend using it every day.

reviews.title: Refresh!!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this shampoo. I only use this once every when I feel my hair still has a lot of product build up. This really helps clear through all of that. My hair feels fresh and so much lighter after use. Great product at a great affordable price.

reviews.title: A really nice shampoo!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love that the shampoo includes apple cider vinegar as it is great for hair. The shampoo doesn't have any vinegar smell to it though, the shampoo smells great! It lathers really well and gives my hair a very clean feeling.

reviews.title: This does not clarify your scalp!
reviews.review_text: I needed a good scalp cleanse so I bought this product along with a clarifying shampoo from dove. This product for me does not work. The dove worked so much better at clarifying my scalp. I can’t tell if the Maui Moisture clarifying shampoo does anything differently than a regular shampoo. All in all I don’t recommend this product for girlies that suffer from buildup on the scalp.

reviews.title: Get it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This line has help my dry itchy and sometime scab scalp to be fresh and not itchy No more dandruff since I starting using this line! Like dandruff has been a huge issue for me and this stuff really helped my scalp

reviews.title: Love it would recommend
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo smells amazing and lathers nicely. It feels like it cleans your scalp really nicely especially with the menthol. The packaging is really pretty too it feels like it looks expensive but it’s actually reasonably priced.

reviews.title: Great for removing scalp buildup and defining curls
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received the scalp care clarifying shampoo from Maui Moisture and Influenster in exchange for my honest review. I like that I received a full size 13 oz bottle instead of a trial size so I can properly try the product multiple times and form an opinion. The shampoo is in a squeeze bottle, so the product is very easy to dispense. The minty scent of the shampoo is invigorating and helps to make it feel like my scalp is getting clean and any build up is being removed since I typically only wash my hair about 2x a week. Although I feel like I’ve noticed a difference with removing buildup on my scalp, the bottle claims to help prevent hair fall, which I have not noticed a significant improvement in. However, the shampoo bottle says it’s made for all curl types, and I have noticed that my waves/loose curls are much smoother and more defined after using this product line. I would definitely repurchase!

reviews.title: Lightweight
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a new must have for my hair routine, the shampoo leaves my hair feeling clean, refreshed after the very first wash. It is lightweight shampoo and leaves my hair feeling soft even without a conditioner. I wasn’t sure about the apple vinegar smell but it’s not overpowering, nor does it linger. I have thick hair and usually have to use quite a bit of shampoo to get it to lather up but with this shampoo, I only need a little dab and it goes along way. ￼￼￼￼￼￼￼

reviews.title: Smells like coconut and adds shine
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this product. First off, I could smell the coconut in it which is refreshing. I feel like it cleansed my hair pretty well and it was softer. Ive been using the shampoo and conditioner for a week or so now and I think my hair does look shinier.

reviews.title: Great product, bad smell
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I’m very happy with how this conditioner and shampoo make my hair feel and look. My hair takes on a great shine, looks full and feels soft. My main issue with the products is the smell. It’s not a terrible smell but also doesn’t smell good. It has some hints of mint and other notes I can’t identify but it’s overall not a scent I would prefer.

reviews.title: Works well
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I’ve used this brand before & I’ve enjoyed other products. I hadn’t tried a scalp care/clarifying products before this. It feels nice in my hair, lathers nicely and I have noticed a change with my scalp. When I use hairspray or mousse my scalp gets itchy & this helps to ensure all the product build up goes away. Leave my scalp feeling healthy, definitely worth repurchasing! Best part is that it’s affordable.

reviews.title: No complaints !!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I used this about once a week in my shower routine when I felt my scalp needed it and there was no complaints at all the smell was good and the foaming was amazing I felt like you didn’t much for it to start doing what needed to be done. The clean feeling it left on my scalp was also very nice. I would recommend this if you didn’t have to much money splurge on but needed a good cleansing shampoo.

reviews.title: Very clean feeling and smelling
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product for free from Influenster and Maui Moisture in exchange for my honest review. This shampoo leaves my hair so clean. The scent is light but fresh I follow-up with the conditioner and it feels very clarifying without any buildup. I don't have curly hair, so I cannot comment on its effectiveness on curls.

reviews.title: Super cleaning shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product from Influenster and Maui Moisture in exchange for my honest review. The Maui Moisture Scalp Care Clarifying Shampoo with Apple Cider Vinegar is awesome! It cleans your scalp really well, getting rid of buildup and excess oil without making your hair feel dry. Your hair ends up feeling super fresh, shiny, and soft. It's perfect if you want a deep clean and a balanced scalp.

reviews.title: Nope not for me
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] After trying the shampoo conditioner and serum, there was a minty sensation on my scalp but after a day or 2, my scalp became dry and flaky. I had to stop using it and had to buy a tea tree oil for my scalp to help with the dryness and flakiness. Didn’t like it

reviews.title: Great product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love the packaging! Smells great! Hair felt clean at the scalp! Definitely a great way to remove all the buildup in your hair and scalp. I highly recommend this for those who have curly hair as well.

reviews.title: Scrub a dub
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like the smell of this shampoo! Smells so good! It was also easy to get rubbed into all of my hair. Sometimes shampoos just get soaked into one spot before you can get it rubbed in really but this shampoo made it easy to get all over. It washed my hair really well and left it smelling great! *I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review*

reviews.title: Great product bad packaging
reviews.review_text: The plastic bottles are so hard, it’s really difficult to get any product. The caps don’t come off, so there’s no solution. I suffered through a bottle, great results with the product, but it’s a workout to use it! Whoever packages the product obviously doesn’t use it.

reviews.title: Love!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo smells great and lathers nicely. It makes my hair feel clean without stripping it of moisture. I’ve been really impressed with the everything I have used from this brand and was excited to see something for scalp care AND curls.

reviews.title: Freah clarifying shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this shampoo. It does a good job cleaning without feeling too stripped on my curly hair. My scalp does feel really fresh. I probably couldn’t use this every wash but it is good for every couple of washes. I can’t speak to the long term benefits yet. I received this product free for testing.

reviews.title: Leaves hair drier than before
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] As someone with extremely fine and wavy/frizzy hair, I’ve spent most of my adult life looking for a product that leaves my hair soft. I thought this was it, but it was not. I think apple cider vinegar leaves my hair drier than I started. The only plus is the smell. It smells fantastic.

reviews.title: Great cleansing shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I was kind of worried about using this because of the Apple cider vinegar has, but it does not like my hair dry. I do like that lather really well and it really takes off all the grease and oils in my hair without stripping it. I do like the scent is not overpowering. I do like the packaging on this. I do like that. The shampoo comes out easily and it does not leak everywhere. this once a week and it does not leave my hair dry or anything like I’ve mentioned before I do recommend this.

reviews.title: Dry hair looked/felt amazing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received complementary from Influenster and Maui Moisture the Maui Moisture Scalp Care Clarifying Shampoo with Apple Cider Vinegar to try then give my opinion of it. First I will say that I love clarifying shampoos in general. When I initially tried this I was not expecting a lot from it as while actively shampooing my hair felt a bit coarse. But once dry my hair was so soft and shiney. It suds up beautifully. Smells wonderful. It is vegan, has aloe and coconut water. Free from silicones,mineral oil, parabens, sulfates, and synthetic dyes! Overall it is a wonderful formula and the first ingredient is Aloe!

reviews.title: I would recommend this shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this shampoo! As a curly girl, it's always a pleasure to find something that works well with your hair. I love that this has apple cider vinegar, and that it's helping balance my PH and clarify my scalp at the same time. I love the minty feeling it gives.

reviews.title: Good for once a week
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It’s definitely great at removing buildup and leaving my scalp squeaky clean but I tried to use this on a daily basis and it left my hair somewhat dry and course. Imo, I think it would be a great product to use once a week but not everyday.

reviews.title: Clarifying Shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love having a clarifying shampoo to clean out some of the products out of my hair. This one is strong enough to clean out my hair but doesn’t leave it feeling dry or damaged. They did a great job of balancing it out

reviews.title: Shampoo review
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pros: Smells like a minty vanilla, love the container, cheap price, looks fancy and cute! Cons: Being that it has Apple cider vinegar, I was hoping it would not cause build up. Unfortunately, I felt like it caused build up and dried my hair. One of the first ingredients is alcohol which is probably why my hair was dried out. Note: As far as effectiveness, I have thick hair and maybe that’s why it did not work for me. Also, there isn’t completely soft water where I live so this could be another factor.

reviews.title: Clean scalp
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This has a nice consistency that isn’t super thick with a minty scent that smells like candy cane. I like that this lathers well and leaves my scalp and hair feeling nice and clean without stripping it of all its natural oils.

reviews.title: Great for buildup and hard water!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like to use a clarifying shampoo about once a month because I have really hard water and use hairspray, gel, and sunscreen in my hair and this product works really well to make it feel clean and hydrated but not stripped. This removes buildup better than a normal shampoo and if I shampoo twice with a normal shampoo to try to get cleaner it dries my hair out too much but this doesn’t and I only have to use it once

reviews.title: Love me a great scalp and a healthy hair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Where I grew up there is a lot of organic and natural ingredients used for hair and scalp health one of the being apple cider vinegar. But this beauty opposed to using the raw ingredients with the unpleasant scent smells super lovely and leaves the hair super clean and soft. I truly fell in love with it on the first use. Totally worth every penny and deserves all five stars from texture to packaging to formula

reviews.title: Smells good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo has a minty clean smell to it and seemed to really leave my hair feeling clean, but unfortunately I suffer from a very sensitive scalp and this caused me some dryness which then causes my scalp to flake. It’s hard for me to find a shampoo my scalp isn’t sensitive too honestly. My daughter uses it though with no issues. It lathers up really nice and I think it’s a good value for your money. If you suffer from any psoriasis issues it may not be the shampoo for you.

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product leaves my hair, feeling really clean and healthy. It smells good for having vinegar in it. The price is affordable and I definitely would use it regardless of getting it for free from Influenster.￼

reviews.title: Maui
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this product from influenster in exchange for my honest review. This shampoo has a great lite scent. The packaging is beautiful. It's leaves my hair feeling clean it only takes a little to thoroughly wash my hair. The price is great and within my budget.

reviews.title: Love Maui!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I’ve been using Maui for a while, but the apple cider vinegar adds an extra touch! Love that there aren’t any sulfates, but it’s still so effective in cleaning my hair and leaving me smelling great!

reviews.title: Great shampoo!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a great shampoo to use to deeply clean your hair. I would use this after I've been using dry shampoo to scrub away all the product build up. It leaves my scalp feeling clean without feeling too dry. The smell is also pleasant. I haven't noticed any difference in my hair yet but I'm sure getting rid of the buildup will help my hair get stronger. Overall, I recommend this shampoo!

reviews.title: Clean scalp
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this shampoo. It leaves my scalp clean. I wash twice with it and then I use the conditioner from the same line. It doesn’t make my hair greasy and I love that it contains apple cider vinegar which has so many benefits for the scalp.

reviews.title: Smells nice, did not work for my hair.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] So I’m someone who has had scalp issues for a bit now — it’s either dry and flaky or oily and weighs my hair down. I was so excited to try these scalp products, but unfortunately this shampoo is not it for me. Washing with this shampoo made my hair feel very dry and brittle. Had to use a bunch of conditioner after as my hair felt like straw.

reviews.title: Love this shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Umm hello!!! I’m obsessed! These products are so good together and work great separately too. I love the refreshing scent and the tingle from the shampoo and conditioner. The oil is nourishing and hydrating. I love the packaging and the ingredients. Great product!!!

reviews.title: Great shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Pretty good shampoo . I like the scent It's light not strong. It makes my hair feel very clean and refreshing. I feel like my scalp is more hydrated and has less dandruff. It's really good if you use a lot of prodicts on your hair I feel it removes all the build up. I wish it was more moisturizing.

reviews.title: Healthy scalp and hair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really liked how this shampoo made my hair feel and look. I noticed my hair looking less greasy than usual. My scalp felt moisturized and not irritated. It smells great, creates a good lather & leaves my hair feeling extremely clean. I don’t notice any residue or oiliness after using. It’s an inexpensive product that feels luxurious.

reviews.title: Cleans without stripping
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a great shampoo!! Thoroughly cleans without stripping my hair dry. Smells nice. I think since using this my hair has been more shiny and volumized. I’m planning to repurchase once the bottle is out!

reviews.title: try it
reviews.review_text: this works well and smells good leaves hair shiny

reviews.title: Cleans hair but has a strong smell
reviews.review_text: Scalp felt clean and refreshed but the smell is very strong and it’s not pleasant smelling.
Made my hair so soft. I feel good about the ingredients.

reviews.title: Yes please
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Works very well great for dry scalps good texture lathers well great price for the quality of the product packaging is different than your normal shampoo bottle

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo not only smells great, but truly does clean my hair without stripping it or drying anything out. I would totally repurchase this product.

reviews.title: Amazing product!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My scalp has never felt cleaner or healthier. I love love love this shampoo and will be buying it again in the near future. It smells amazing and the packaging is nice and clean looking.

reviews.title: Affordable price
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Smells really good package very convenient affordable for anyone who wants to purchase texture is very creamy loved it leaves my hair very smooth and shiny

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this. Smells nice and has a fresh tingling feel to it. I don’t use this every day, just when I feel like my scalp needs an extra clean wash! I like to follow this with an in shower mask!

reviews.title: Fresh feeling hair
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Scalp Care Clarifying Shampoo with Apple Cider Vinegar makes no hair feel so fresh and clean. I love the slight tingle it gives my scalp. Makes my hair smell so good too, definitely recommend!

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I had time wanting to try this brand and it left me really surprised by its effectiveness, it smells super rich, the texture is amazing and the price is affordable, I really recommend it.

reviews.title: Cleans well
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love a clarifying shampoo and appreciated that this one helped remove gunk and build up from my hair. The smell was surprising at first but I grew to like it

reviews.title: Smells amazing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The smell of this collection is incredible! The fresh peppermint makes my scalp feel extra clean. I haven’t noticed any actual effects but my hair is clean :)

reviews.title: So refreshing! Feels like vacation!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Maui Scalp Care Clarifying Shampoo has a rich creamy texture and smells like rosemary and mint. It made my hair smell and feel great! Great value! Easy squeeze container.

reviews.title: So good!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Arrived in tact. Love the smell! Doesn't leave any residue after one wash and rinse - no need to repeat. I've even taken it on vacation with me and the packaging held up.

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like the smell of this product, which is a large factor when I pick products. This is a great option for a clarifying shampoo, I really like it!

reviews.title: cleansing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] my hair feels clean after using this clarifying shampoo. it is gentle enough that i would use it with every wash. it does not have a smell which i enjoy.

reviews.title: Nice trio package
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This smells great. It enhances your curls. It feels good on your scalp. Love that it comes as a set and a system for your curly hair needs. The packaging is aesthetically pleasing.

reviews.title: Glad to try this product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Glad to try this brand, smells great and feels refreshing on the scalp. Feel like it's efficient. Would recommend to others. Pricing is fine. . .

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This stuff is out of this world. I’m definitely going to be using this from now on. It’s the best shampoo I’ve ever had and the smell is awesome and it makes my hair feel soo good afterwards.

reviews.title: Smells & feels very clean
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Smells very clean and refreshing. Definitely feels like my hair gets a reset and deep clean. Really like the bottle shape to fit in the shower as well

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I looove how this smells! It leftd my hair smelling amazing. It did what it was supposed to do. My hair felt very nice and clean. It felt like it removed so much build up

reviews.title: A buildup eliminator!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo has really helped me to eliminate buildup in my scalp. It smells amazing and results are instant. I love this shampoo/conditioner combo!

reviews.title: Nice for the price
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love the scent of these however I am not a huge fan of the way it makes my hair feel. The value is good though. For a value of hair care line it does a great job!

reviews.title: Decent shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Packaging is visually appealing and easy to use. The product smells pretty good considering it has apple cider vinegar as an ingredient. Overall hair feels clean after use.

reviews.title: Nice shampoo
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo leaves my hair feeling clean. The scent is nice kinda of a menthol but very faint. The packaging is really cute. Pricing is on point with other products like this.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I really like this shampoo! It smells nice and makes my hair feel clean. The only downside to this is the bottle shape and the type of plastic- it is very difficult to squeeze.

reviews.title: Love
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Nice and light clarifying shampoo. Usually they make my hair feel stripped, but my hair feels clean as well as hydrated after using this shampoo!

reviews.title: Clean and clarifying shampoo.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is my first time trying out this brand. I have to say this clarifying shampoo left my hair feeling clean and shiny. The scent is not overwhelming.

reviews.title: Good not great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like that this cleans without stripping my hair and my curls do look nice with it. There is just nothing amazing about it to write home with it works and does its job but not much more.

reviews.title: Shampoo cleans scalp
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This shampoo does help to clean my scalp. It does have a minty/vinegar scent and tingles slightly, but it feels nice.. I received this product free for my honest review.

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Extremely minty. If you love that feeling through your hair then go for it! I find it refreshing but I’m not in love with the shampoo. My hair doesn’t feel super clear for some reason

reviews.title: Smells great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This scalp care shampoo smelled so good. It left my hair shinning, soft and without tangles. It comes in a cute fancy looking bottle. I definitely will be purchasing this product in the future

reviews.title: Good but not great
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I like this, but didn’t love it. The scent is very strong so take that for what you will. Did a decent job and will continue to use to see if I like it over time

reviews.title: Nice product
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This product Works well to clarify scalp and hair buildup. Feels nice and smooth. Has a nice clean scent and is a good price. Would purchase again.
